description:
The Basics of Xcode 7 Auto Layout and Constraints. Hope you find these lessons helpful. There is noting as frustrating as having a wonderful App, working fantastic with code but with bad Layouts and Conflicting Constraints.

Coding is one part of the App development and then there is the graphics and layout needs. Constraints and Layout gets talked about like a stepchild and it takes so much time to read about it that I decided to make a quick tutorial and hope you like it.

I will be working on a more detailed Layout and Constraint Lecture if requested. Any and all kinds of feedback will be taken to hart and I will work on improving my style and my information to better serve the students.

Regards,

Elizabeth
title: Xcode 7 Auto Layout and Constraints
